channel.title: resilience on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in resilience on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: Making the OONI Probe Android app more resilient
item.description: We recently made OONI Probe Android more robust against accidental or deliberate blocking of our backend services. Specifically, we implemented support for specifying a proxy that speaks with OONIâ€™s backend services. We also improved the build process to influence the TLS Client Hello fingerprint, which helps with avoiding accidental blocking. Adding support for a proxy Changing our Android TLS fingerprint Future improvements Adding support for a proxy Since late 2020, community members have been reporting specific OONI Probe Android failures.
